title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and uniforms. I wonder what the teacher will have us do today.
memory: Noticed formal classroom setup with flags

action: Sit up straight and face forward, subtly shaking head to discourage further whispering
thoughts: The armband students are watching and taking notes. I shouldn't have whispered back. Need to follow the rules and avoid getting negative attention or losing points.
memory: Decided to strictly follow classroom rules to avoid penalties

action: Maintain forward gaze while subtly scanning the room for any additional surveillance indicators
thoughts: I need to be extra careful after that whispered conversation. The armband students are watching everyone closely and I don't want to lose any discipline points. Following the rules strictly is the only way to avoid trouble in this experiment.
memory: Noticed increased surveillance from armband students
Decided to maintain perfect compliance with classroom rules
Aware of potential consequences for rule violations

action: Maintain rigid posture while discreetly scanning for any visible rule violations among classmates
thoughts: I need to be extra careful and also watch others to ensure I'm not associated with any rule-breaking. The armband students are everywhere, and I don't want to lose any discipline points.
memory: Noticed comprehensive surveillance system with multiple observation points
Decided to actively monitor classmates for rule compliance to maintain good standing
